assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Fujikura Kasei Co., Ltd. provides various coatings and painting materials in Japan and internationally. It provides plastic coatings, including paints for interior and exterior parts, and electrical components for automobiles; and specialty coatings, such as hard coats, primers, paints for films, paints for tube type containers, heat release paints, paints for PVD, other paints for substrates and soft touch feel, and paintings for hobby fields. The company also offers architectural coatings for use in detached housing exterior finishing materials; functional polymers and resins comprising resins for toners and adhesives, functional resins, charge control agents, functional particles, industrial adhesives, electronic component materials, electrophotographic materials, and others; medical materials for in-vitro diagnostic pharmaceutical and research reagents fields; and synthetic resins. In addition, it provides electronic materials, such as adhesives for welding and soldering; circuitry, electrode, and connector materials for printed circuit boards; electrically conductive and electrically insulating materials for printed electronics and touch panels; room temperature drying materials; and EMI shield materials. The company was formerly known as Fujikura Kagaku Mfg. Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Fujikura Kasei Co., Ltd. in December 1958. Fujikura Kasei Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1938 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
